DOC.brief_summary: This study follow transplant patient Study A3921030 monitor long term safety , tolerability efficacy 5 additional year , except Portugal study follow transplant patient Month 36 posttransplant . Patients continue study medication previously assign .
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Of Subjects From Study A3921030 For The Prevention Of Acute Rejection In Kidney Transplant Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects successfully complete Study A3921030 Subjects wait list second kidney transplant nonrenal organ transplant
